name: rgou-cloudflare
description: Royal Game of Ur - Ancient Mesopotamian board game with AI opponent

scripts.dev: npm run generate:sw && npm run build:wasm-assets && next dev --turbopack
scripts.build: npm run generate:sw && npm run build:wasm-assets && next build
scripts.build:wasm: cd worker/rust_ai_core && wasm-pack build --target web --out-name rgou_ai_worker -- --features wasm
scripts.build:wasm-assets: npm run build:wasm && rm -rf public/wasm && mkdir -p public/wasm && cp worker/rust_ai_core/pkg/rgou_ai_worker_bg.wasm public/wasm/rgou_ai_core_bg.wasm && cp worker/rust_ai_core/pkg/rgou_ai_worker.js public/wasm/rgou_ai_core.js
scripts.nuke: rm -rf .next .open-next .wrangler node_modules package-lock.json && npm install && npm run dev
scripts.check: npm run lint && npm run type-check && (cd worker/rust_ai_core && cargo test -- --nocapture) && npm run test:coverage && npm run test:e2e
scripts.test:ai:ml-vs-classic: cd worker/rust_ai_core && NUM_GAMES=50 cargo test test_ml_vs_expectiminimax_ai -- --nocapture
